SEARCH
Package entity

Class Character

java.lang.Object
entity.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Killable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Character extends Object implements Killable
The Character class represents a generic entity in the game that can move, attack, and interact with its environment.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Constructs a new Character instance with the specified position and size.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the character
      y - the y-coordinate of the character
      width - the width of the character
      height - the height of the character

  • Method Details

    • initHitBox

      protected void initHitBox(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Initializes the character's hitbox.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the hitbox
      y - the y-coordinate of the hitbox
      width - the width of the hitbox
      height - the height of the hitbox

    • initAttackHitBox

      protected void initAttackHitBox(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Sets up the hitbox for the character's attack.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the attack hitbox
      y - the y-coordinate of the attack hitbox
      width - the width of the attack hitbox
      height - the height of the attack hitbox

    • updateAttackHitBox

      protected void updateAttackHitBox(int offset)
      Updates the position of the attack hitbox based on the direction and offset.
      Parameters:
      offset - the vertical offset for adjusting the y-coordinate of the attack hitbox

    • attack

      protected void attack(Character target)

    • takeDamage

      public abstract void takeDamage(int damage)

    • move

      public void move(float dx, Level level)
      Moves the character horizontally within the level. The movement is only allowed collision is not detected.
      Parameters:
      dx - the horizontal movement distance
      level - the current level for collision detection

    • applyGravity

      public void applyGravity(Level level)
      Applies gravity to the character. If falling, the character's vertical position is updated unless a collision occurs with the ground or other objects.
      Parameters:
      level - the current level for collision detection

    • applyKnockback

      public void applyKnockback(float xForce, float yForce)
      Applies a knockback effect to the character, moving its horizontally and vertically by displacing x and y respectively.
      Parameters:
      xForce - the force applied horizontally
      yForce - the force applied vertically
